mapper.select: SELECT code, department, login_name loginName, login_password loginPassword, role, `enabled`, real_name realName FROM callers WHERE login_name = #{username} and login_password = #{password} and `enabled` = 1

select r.`code`, r.login_name loginName, r.real_name realName, GROUP_CONCAT(r.url, '(',r.`explain`,')' separator '„ÄÅ') url from (select c.`code`, c.department, c.login_name, c.login_password , c.real_name, c.role, i.`name` url, i.`explain`, c.update_time, c.enabled from caller_interfaces ci join callers c on c.`code` = ci.caller_code join interfaces i on i.id = ci.interface_id) r group by r.`code`, r.login_name, r.real_name order by r.update_time desc limit #{page}, #{rows}

select `code`, department, login_name as loginName, real_name as realName, login_password as loginPassword, update_time as updateTime, role, enabled from callers order by update_time desc limit #{page}, #{rows}
mapper.insert: insert into callers(`code`, department, login_name, real_name, login_password, role, update_time, enabled) values(#{caller.code}, #{caller.department}, #{caller.loginName}, #{caller.realName} ,#{caller.loginPassword}, #{caller.role}, #{caller.updateTime}, #{caller.enabled})
mapper.select: select count(1) from callers where login_name = #{loginName}
